auctionValidationRules.name: Remaining Budget Constraint
auctionValidationRules.description: Ensure team can still afford remaining players at minimum base price after placing this bid.

onFail.message: Bid exceeds allowed limit! You must retain enough funds to complete your team.

auctionValidationRules.name: Dynamic Maximum Bid Calculation
auctionValidationRules.description: Define the maximum amount a team can bid based on remaining funds and required players.

onFail.message: You cannot bid higher than your max allowed bid limit for this round.

auctionValidationRules.name: Total Budget Cap
auctionValidationRules.description: Prevent team from exceeding allocated total fund.

onFail.message: Insufficient funds! You cannot exceed your allocated total budget.

auctionValidationRules.name: Player Count Limit
auctionValidationRules.description: Ensure team does not purchase more than allowed players.

onFail.message: Team roster full. You cannot buy more players.

auctionValidationRules.name: Minimum Participation Balance
auctionValidationRules.description: Ensure team has enough balance to participate in a bid (at least equal to player's base price).

onFail.message: Insufficient balance to bid for this player.

auctionValidationRules.name: Safe Fund Threshold
auctionValidationRules.description: Maintain a buffer (e.g. 10%) of remaining fund for safe future bidding.

onFail.message: Warning: You are entering the unsafe fund range; consider preserving funds for upcoming players.

auctionValidationRules.name: Category Quota Check
auctionValidationRules.description: Prevent overspending on one player category if minimum players required in others.

onFail.message: Bid exceeds limit considering remaining category quotas.

auctionValidationRules.name: Post-Auction Compliance Check
auctionValidationRules.description: At the end of auction, verify all teams have valid roster and within fund limit.

onFail.message: Team does not meet final auction requirements. Requires admin review.
